TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Suy-wen-di, title = Suy-wen-di, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suy-wen-di} }

S.FORM: == Suy-wen-di 隋文帝 == nikaudipan balaki生平經歷 pilecuhan出生 Yen-cin itida i Si-wi-ta-tun pitu mihcaan enem a bulad sabaw tulu dimiad labi pilecuhan i Pung-yi-pan-zuo-ni-se', pangangan han nu wunsan ci " Na-luo-yen", u "sakapahay nu udipan sa". ci ama ni Yen-cin u Si-wi Suy-kuo-kun, Pei-cuo-cu'-kuo, Ta-se-kun-da-yen-cun, wina cu Lise. acawa u hunhuo nu Pei-cuo nu waluay a kanatalan nu masacacayay nu naiay a malekakaay nu wawaan ci Cia-luo, u "lumeniay a hungan". ,意為"黑沈香"). sakakaay nida a tataynaan a wawa siacawa tu Pei-cuo-sun-ti u hun-huo, sakahemekan ku udip nu kawaw nida. ci Yen-cin itida i henay naw satabakiay nu tahudan, singanganaca tu Ta-sin-cun-kun, midayday tu kawaw nu wama, Pei-cuo wu-ti' sakakaay a tahudan, namilabu milepacaw tu Pei-ci nu nikalepacawan. masakapah henay ci Yen-cin namikilul ci Wu-tiam milawpes tu Pei-ci palecad tu Hua-pei, caay ka tenes tu lingatu nu mihcaan " limpicwal mihcaan" imelang mabelec mapatay, Pei-cuo ci Sin-ti' ku malatahudan.kina mikuwanay. Pei-cu sin-ti' caay kaw kanamuhan a tademaw, mipatay tu sakakaay, maalaw ku kanatal sipabeli tu tunkun a malumanay ci Cen-yi, mabiyalaw namin ku tademaw. tu Ta-cen lingatu nu mihcaan " limpicsiw mihcaan" tusa a bulad caysiw demiad, ci Yi-wen-pin sakamusa a sipabeli nu maku tu pituay a mihcaan nu sakakaay aku a wawaanci Yi-wen-canan, sumad hank u mihcaan nu bangguan u tabakiay a Zo, u tin-yen hunti. . tabakiay Zo tusa a mihcaan "limwalsep mihcaan" tulu a bulad lucay dimiad, ci Yi-wen-can pasingagan han ci Yen-un u Luo-cu sakakaay, tukiw sakakaay, tayda i malumanay a kitidaan misalama, nu ayawan a tusa nu bulad tusa a bataan dimiad, kawili kawanan nu sakakaaym, sumad han ci Yen-cin ku sakakaay nu tahdan. misumad tu hitay軍政改革 cen-ce' a nipacukel tada silaheci tu. mahida ci Cen-yi, Su-wi, Kaw-yin tu pinaay nu tahudan nipicuduh nu heni. ci Yen-cin yadah ku sapisawacuay a kawawan, milalid tu sakaudip, sisa pasikineng han ci Su-wi tu cudad, misumad tu misawacuay a hulican, patideng tu kanatal a hulican, kiya manuneng ku binacadan, mawada ku sakaybakinan, u papatayan a tademaw u melecen, atu litabatan tusa kina hulic, u saka lihalay nu tademawan. itini i sakay cen-li a kawawan, nu nipikuwan ni Yen-cin, caay kapah ku kawaw nida tu sakay kanatalan, misanai' tu tademaw, kaisa tu maanupay nu tademawan a wayway. ci Yen-cin patuduan nida ci Liu-sen milakalak tu lima a bataan idaw ku tusa a niyadu'an, sakamaanupay nu tahudan makaala tu tusa a lasubuan ku tademaw mahemik ku kitidaan. kapah satu ku nipikuwan, macunustu ku sakay kanatalan nu kalisaiw, sa idaw ku sapiedap tu pakuyucay, ka limulakan ci Suy-kaw-cu, u matatungusay kina kawaw sa. sakaudip ni kakenihan tu tulul amis makaala tu tusa a lasubu pitu a bataan nu tenes, mangelu' ku sakaudip, nai' ku micumuday tu kalisiwan nu kanatal, u cun-yun a niyadu'an ku sasiidaay. tu siwa a mihcaan nu Kan-hun "limwalsiw mihcaan", u hitay nu Suy-cun hamin a kapah ku kanatal, u sakaicelang nu kanatalan ku muntiti. mitengil ci Yen-cin tu kamu ni Se-ma-su-wi, alesen ku cikah, pah sapacumud tu damsu i siciw, nikudan kinapina miwada' tu damsu, miwada' tu nitamudungan nu tademaw tu sapatahekal nu damsuan, sapaayaw tu kanatal sakay umahan a nikasilaculan, kya malahat ku sakaudip. . balakitu misiki tu sapipenecaw晚年傾軋 pikuwanan ni Suy-wen-ti pacebasa mipatay tu tahudan, mangalay misakaku, hamaw sa ku tahuda miliyas ci nidaan. tada micidek tu ku atekak, micidek ku sakay pibakinan, matalaw namin ku binacadan. paka "kapahay nu nikalingatuan" pakainai'en ku laheci. sakamusa, kabalihenawan ku nikasikawawan, nu mimangdayay a tademaw hamin han mipatay, u nipibakin alaw ba'ke't tu nai' t uku natademawan, caay tu kahida nu kalingatuan nu hulican. . epingeng nida ku pinaay a tatamaan a wawaan, pululen nida ku sakatulu nu tatamaan a wawa ci Yen-cun, sakasepat a wawa ci Yen-siw palahida han u hucu nu tademaw. ci Wen-di nai' ku tanektekay a aenengan, palawpesen nida ku babalaki patideng tu wawa, ci Yen-kun palawpesan nida ci Yen-yung, sa patideng tu Tan-caw a Tan-kaw-cu Li-yen malecad a patelac, sisa ci Suy-tan-se-ce saan u Suy-ca nika hinian ku nikademec. . Wen-di balakitu ku nikaudaip hina palawpes, manamuh tu kanamuhan, sademiad sa midang, ina la'cusay a waywayan mapalalid ci tayce Yeng-kun, yu mikuwan henay ci Wen-ti mamin mapalawpes ku nicuwkingan, mamin mapalawpes ni Yeng-kun. .

== Soy-wen-di 隋文帝 == nikaodipan balaki生平經歷 pilecohan出生 Yen-cin itida i Si-wi-ta-ton pito mihcaan enem a bolad sabaw tolo dimiad labi pilecohan i Pong-yi-pan-zoo-ni-se', pangangan han no wonsan ci " Na-loo-yen", o "sakapahay no odipan sa". ci ama ni Yen-cin o Si-wi Soy-koo-kon, Pei-coo-co'-koo, Ta-se-kon-da-yen-con, wina co Lise. acawa o honhoo no Pei-coo no waloay a kanatalan no masacacayay no naiay a malekakaay no wawaan ci Cia-loo, o "lomeniay a hongan". ,意為"黑沈香"). sakakaay nida a tataynaan a wawa siacawa to Pei-coo-son-ti o hon-hoo, sakahemekan ko odip no kawaw nida. ci Yen-cin itida i henay naw satabakiay no tahodan, singanganaca to Ta-sin-con-kon, midayday to kawaw no wama, Pei-coo wo-ti' sakakaay a tahodan, namilabo milepacaw to Pei-ci no nikalepacawan. masakapah henay ci Yen-cin namikilol ci Wo-tiam milawpes to Pei-ci palecad to Hoa-pei, caay ka tenes to lingato no mihcaan " limpicwal mihcaan" imelang mabelec mapatay, Pei-coo ci Sin-ti' ko malatahodan.kina mikowanay. Pei-co sin-ti' caay kaw kanamohan a tademaw, mipatay to sakakaay, maalaw ko kanatal sipabeli to tonkon a malomanay ci Cen-yi, mabiyalaw namin ko tademaw. to Ta-cen lingato no mihcaan " limpicsiw mihcaan" tosa a bolad caysiw demiad, ci Yi-wen-pin sakamosa a sipabeli no mako to pitoay a mihcaan no sakakaay ako a wawaanci Yi-wen-canan, somad hank o mihcaan no banggoan o tabakiay a Zo, o tin-yen honti. . tabakiay Zo tosa a mihcaan "limwalsep mihcaan" tolo a bolad locay dimiad, ci Yi-wen-can pasingagan han ci Yen-on o Loo-co sakakaay, tokiw sakakaay, tayda i malomanay a kitidaan misalama, no ayawan a tosa no bolad tosa a bataan dimiad, kawili kawanan no sakakaaym, somad han ci Yen-cin ko sakakaay no tahdan. misomad to hitay軍政改革 cen-ce' a nipacokel tada silaheci to. mahida ci Cen-yi, So-wi, Kaw-yin to pinaay no tahodan nipicodoh no heni. ci Yen-cin yadah ko sapisawacoay a kawawan, milalid to sakaodip, sisa pasikineng han ci So-wi to codad, misomad to misawacoay a holican, patideng to kanatal a holican, kiya manoneng ko binacadan, mawada ko sakaybakinan, o papatayan a tademaw o melecen, ato litabatan tosa kina holic, o saka lihalay no tademawan. itini i sakay cen-li a kawawan, no nipikowan ni Yen-cin, caay kapah ko kawaw nida to sakay kanatalan, misanai' to tademaw, kaisa to maanopay no tademawan a wayway. ci Yen-cin patodoan nida ci Lio-sen milakalak to lima a bataan idaw ko tosa a niyado'an, sakamaanopay no tahodan makaala to tosa a lasoboan ko tademaw mahemik ko kitidaan. kapah sato ko nipikowan, maconosto ko sakay kanatalan no kalisaiw, sa idaw ko sapiedap to pakoyocay, ka limolakan ci Soy-kaw-co, o matatongosay kina kawaw sa. sakaodip ni kakenihan to tolol amis makaala to tosa a lasobo pito a bataan no tenes, mangelo' ko sakaodip, nai' ko micomoday to kalisiwan no kanatal, o con-yon a niyado'an ko sasiidaay. to siwa a mihcaan no Kan-hon "limwalsiw mihcaan", o hitay no Soy-con hamin a kapah ko kanatal, o sakaicelang no kanatalan ko montiti. mitengil ci Yen-cin to kamo ni Se-ma-so-wi, alesen ko cikah, pah sapacomod to damso i siciw, nikodan kinapina miwada' to damso, miwada' to nitamodongan no tademaw to sapatahekal no damsoan, sapaayaw to kanatal sakay omahan a nikasilacolan, kya malahat ko sakaodip. . balakito misiki to sapipenecaw晚年傾軋 pikowanan ni Soy-wen-ti pacebasa mipatay to tahodan, mangalay misakako, hamaw sa ko tahoda miliyas ci nidaan. tada micidek to ko atekak, micidek ko sakay pibakinan, matalaw namin ko binacadan. paka "kapahay no nikalingatoan" pakainai'en ko laheci. sakamosa, kabalihenawan ko nikasikawawan, no mimangdayay a tademaw hamin han mipatay, o nipibakin alaw ba'ke't to nai' t oko natademawan, caay to kahida no kalingatoan no holican. . epingeng nida ko pinaay a tatamaan a wawaan, pololen nida ko sakatolo no tatamaan a wawa ci Yen-con, sakasepat a wawa ci Yen-siw palahida han o hoco no tademaw. ci Wen-di nai' ko tanektekay a aenengan, palawpesen nida ko babalaki patideng to wawa, ci Yen-kon palawpesan nida ci Yen-yong, sa patideng to Tan-caw a Tan-kaw-co Li-yen malecad a patelac, sisa ci Soy-tan-se-ce saan o Soy-ca nika hinian ko nikademec. . Wen-di balakito ko nikaodaip hina palawpes, manamoh to kanamohan, sademiad sa midang, ina la'cosay a waywayan mapalalid ci tayce Yeng-kon, yo mikowan henay ci Wen-ti mamin mapalawpes ko nicowkingan, mamin mapalawpes ni Yeng-kon. .
